title: 'Star Trek' legend George Takei talks Nimoy's directing, the future of exploration, and his sad plastic umbrella (interview)
description: "Science fiction is all about the imagination. And it can be exploring space or exploring that mysterious organism called our bodies."
content: "Science fiction is all about the imagination. And it can be exploring space or exploring that mysterious organism called our bodies."
